titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, October 30, 1962

mods.tableOfContents: Kiowa-Indian City Anadarko (Kiowa Veterans & Auxiliary). Announcements. Mr. and Mrs. Yale Spottedbird. Kiowa speech, Henry Taindoah. Tonkongha Program, Mr. and Mrs. Joe Kaulaity. Flag Song. Mr. and Mrs. James Anquoe. Mr. and Mrs. David Apekaum. Mr. and Mrs. Leonard Cozad. Vincent Spottedbird. Jane Taptoe. Paul Tahlo. John Emhoolah. Scott Tonemah. Student guests: Tony Isaacs. Della Hopper. Jerry Cross. Vernon Hanagara.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
